samples.question: Tell me, Bella, what is the weather like in your hometown?
samples.transcript: My hometown is Fuling, which, which has two typical weather. First is the hot season. I think it starts from January to August and the rainy season, Which is from August to December. So if you want to visit my hometown to enjoy the cold and sunny beaches, you may avoid the rainy season because it is not also rainy. it is not only rainy but also really cold. Brilliant. Well done.

samples.question: So the question is, could you please describe a holiday you would like to go on in the future?

samples.question: However, if I had to pick one, it would be Japan.
samples.transcript: I would like to visit there with my beloved family. And there are a variety of activities I could do there. For example, enjoying the native, cuisine such as mochi or ramen. I saw them a lot on social media and I really want to try it. Next is, visit famous places such as the Fuji mountain or the Ghibli park. I love you completely. And the reason why I love to visit Japan is mainly because I have always dreamed of being there since I was a child. And also a trip to a foreign country can help me expand my knowledge which is important because I can learn more about their culture the culture there And the main reason is I really love the cherry blossom tree. So if I have a chance to visit Japan, I would go, I choose to visit it there on May or April. In the future, I would like to visit there with my beloved family and also my friends. Okay Bella, thank you for telling me all about Japan.

samples.question: Bella, what are the advantages and disadvantages of international travel?
samples.transcript: One of the main benefits of it is you can practice your English with the native foreigners. And on the other hand, on the other hand, the cost is very expensive. For example, only the rich can be sitting overseas countries such as Italy or France. And for me personally, I do not have enough money to travel there. Maybe in the future.

samples.question: Do you think tourism has changed compared to the past?
samples.transcript: Absolutely. And one of the huge change I think is the transportation. In the past people, people usually traveled With cars or trains, but now we have airplane, so, and ship, so it is more convenient. And also, I think, it is more affordable and acceptable for people to travel now. Thank you. Well done.

samples.question: Where was the last place you visited on holiday?
